 <!--Head-->
<h1 align="center">Fanta: Provocation Game</h1>

<h3>
If your party becomes boring and uninteresting, you want to experience different emotions from fun ending with sadness or even anger, then our game will allow you to learn the dirtiest and darkest secrets of your friends. Intrigued? Then download it quickly and enjoy the game!

Features of the game:<br>
⭐️ Getting achievements during the game<br>
⭐ The game has a huge database of questions that are suitable for all genders and ages<br>
⭐️ Variety of themes, make the game unique and interesting<br>

How to play?<br>
The rules are very simple! You need to press the "go" button and wait for fortune to determine the topic for you. On the topic that you will drop out, a question that needs to be answered will be randomly highlighted.
</h3>

</h3>
